```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
library(RMySQL)
```

```{r variablesDeEntorno, eval=FALSE}
usethis::edit_r_environ(
  scope = "project"
)
```
```{r}
con <- DBI::dbConnect(
  RMySQL::MySQL(),
  host = Sys.getenv("DB_HOST"),
  port = 3306,
  user = Sys.getenv("DB_USER"),
  password = Sys.getenv("DB_PASS"),
  dbname = Sys.getenv("DB_NAME")
)
```

```{r}
DBI::dbGetQuery(
  con,
  "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `conteo_vehicular`"
)
```

```{r}
DBI::dbGetQuery(
  con,
  "SELECT * FROM `conteo_vehicular` GROUP BY `fecha`
  "
)
```
